org.magicdgs.readtools.engine.sourcehandler

Class ReadsSourceHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.magicdgs.readtools.engine.sourcehandler.ReadsSourceHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FastqSourceHandler, SamSourceHandler

    public abstract class ReadsSourceHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable
    Handler for a ReadTools source of reads. All the source handlers have the following properties: - Call to iteration methods always start from the beginning of the file/source. - Operations for get the quality encoding and header always return a fresh instance independent of previous calls.

    • Field Summary

      protected java.lang.String source
      The handled source string.

    • Method Detail

      • getHandledSource

        public java.lang.String getHandledSource()
        Gets the handled source.

      • getQualityEncoding

        public abstract htsjdk.samtools.util.FastqQualityFormat getQualityEncoding(long maxNumberOfReads)
        Guess the quality encoding by reading maxNumberOfReads.

      • getHeader

        public abstract htsjdk.samtools.SAMFileHeader getHeader()
        Gets the header for the source of reads. It may be a simple header, but never null.

      • toIterator

        public abstract java.util.Iterator<org.broadinstitute.hellbender.utils.read.GATKRead> toIterator()
        Converts a source into an iterator. It always starts for the beginning of the file, so multiple iterations does not affect the rest of the open iterations.

      • toIntervalIterator

        public abstract java.util.Iterator<org.broadinstitute.hellbender.utils.read.GATKRead> toIntervalIterator(java.util.List<org.broadinstitute.hellbender.utils.SimpleInterval> locs)
        Converts a source into an iterator which overlaps with the provided intervals. It always starts for the beginning of the file, so multiple iterations does not affect the rest of the open iterations. Note: unmapped reads will not be returned by this iterator.

      • toStream

        public java.util.stream.Stream<org.broadinstitute.hellbender.utils.read.GATKRead> toStream()
        Returns an ordered stream for the reads.

      • getHandler

        public static ReadsSourceHandler getHandler(java.lang.String source,
                                            ReadReaderFactory factory)
        Gets a handler to the provided source: FASTQ or SAM/BAM/CRAM. Note: the source use the extension to determine the kind of source.
        Parameters:
        source - the source string.
        Returns:
        the source handler.
